item.title: Use Github Repo Secret in Python (without Action)
item.description: If you google “how to use github secrets and variables in python”, almost all the answers talk about GitHub Actions/workflows. But, does it have to be so? ChatGPT just showed me, “No!” When you add the XXX API access key as a repository secret in GitHub, you can access it within your Python script by using the os module to access environment variables.
